column2: These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.

Do you want to let members create stores? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply. This is useful if you want members to be able to view stores, but only want certain levels to be able to create stores.

Do you want to let members create products? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply. This is useful if you want members to be able to view products, but only want certain levels to be able to create products.

This page lists all of the stores your users have posted. You can use this page to monitor these stores and delete offensive material if necessary. Entering criteria into the filter fields will help you find specific stores. Leaving the filter fields blank will show all the stores on your social network.
This page lists all of the orders your users have created. Entering criteria into the filter fields will help you find specific orders. Leaving the filter fields blank will show all the orders.

This page lists all of the products your users have posted. You can use this page to monitor these products and delete offensive material if necessary. Entering criteria into the filter fields will help you find specific products. Leaving the filter fields blank will show all the products on your social network.
This page lists all of the transactions. Entering criteria into the filter fields will help you find specific transactions. Leaving the filter fields blank will show all the transactions.

Do you want to let members create products? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply. This is useful if you want members to be able to view products, but only want certain levels to be able to create products.
If you want to sell your product on our website, you have to pay publishing-product fee. Please choose the fee package that you like.
Please choose the gateway which is used to purchase
You have just chosen paypal as your payment gateway. Please confirm if you really want to purchase.

This page lists all of the refunds your users have posted. You can use this page to monitor these refunds. Entering criteria into the filter fields will help you find specific refunds. Leaving the filter fields blank will show all the refunds on your social network.

This page lists all of the requests your users have posted. You can use this page to monitor these requests. Entering criteria into the filter fields will help you find specific requests. Leaving the filter fields blank will show all the requests on your social network.
Please fill the necessary shipping information in these fields below. The sellers will base on these information to deliver your purchase.
Please fill the necessary billing information in these fields below
If you want to open a store on our website, you have to pay publishing-store fee. Please choose the fee package that you like.
Please edit info of the currency below.
Please fill the necessary information in these fields below to complete the request process.
If you want to send messages to Seller, please input below.

2Checkout Account Configuration:
1) If you haven't already, you will need to establish a 2Checkout account.
2) Create a new username, checking both the API Access and API Updating checkboxes. Insert the newly created username and password into this form below.
Note: If you change the secret word in your 2Checkout account, you will need to visit this page again and re-save the settings.
3) Update the Site Management page, selecting the "Header Redirect" option, and pasting the following into the "Approved URL" field:
%5$s

Google Checkout Account Configuration:
1) If you haven't already, you will need to establish a Google Checkout account.
2) After you have created your Google Merchant account, go to "Account Setting" and "Integration" to get Google merchant ID and Google merchant key and insert them into this form below.
3) Still at the page above, choose "Notification as XML" option at "Callback Contents" and paste the following into the "API callback URL" field:
%1$s

Our members will be asked to provide some information about their store listing when creating a new store. Create some store questions that allow them to describe their store in a way that relates to the theme of your community. To reorder the store questions, click on their names and drag them up or down.
Please provide your credit card information below for performing the transaction.
Please establish an Authorize.Net merchant account and provide the API Info of your account below.

Paypal Account Configuration:
1) If you haven't already, you will need to establish a Paypal account.
2) Enable API access on your Paypal account via: My Account > Profile > API Access > Request API credentials > Request API Signature.
3) Insert the Paypal API username, password, and signature values into this form.
4) Enable Instant Payment Notifications via: My Account > Profile > Instant Payment Notification Preferences > Choose IPN Settings. The IPN messages should be enabled.
5) Go to X Commerce and request an Application ID to input to the field below.
This can be added to other emails using the [header] placeholder.
This can be added to other emails using the [footer] placeholder.
This can be added to other emails using the [header] placeholder.
This can be added to other emails using the [footer] placeholder.
This is the email that gets sent to members whose stores got approved.

[header]

Your Store [store_title] at [store_link] has just been approved. 

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to members whose products got approved.

[header]

Your Product [product_title] at [product_link] of your Store [store_title] at [store_link] has just been approved. 

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to members who purchase products.
You have just bought a product!

[header]

You have just purchase from our website with below order: 

[ordercontent]

==========Your Information============

Name: [buyer_name]
Email Address: [buyer_email]
Address: [buyer_address]

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to members whose products got purchased.

[header]

Congratulation! Your product has been bought!

==========Product Detail==============

Name of Product: [product_title]
Link of Product: [product_link]	
Name of Store: [store_title]
Link of Store: [store_link]	

Quantity:     [product_quantity]
Unit Price:   [product_price]
Total:        [product_total]

Order ID: [store_orderid]

==========Buyer Information============

Name: [buyer_name]
Email Address: [buyer_email]
Address: [buyer_address]

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to members whose request has been accepted.

[header]

Your account request has been accepted. Please check your financial account. 
==========Details==============
Store: [store_title]
Store Link: [store_link]
Request Amount: [request_amount]

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to members whose request has been denied.

[header]

We are afraid we have to inform you that your account request has been denied.
Please contact administrator for more information.
==========Details==============
Store: [store_title]
Store Link: [store_link]
Request Amount: [request_amount]

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to members whose products has been deleted.

[header]

We are sorry to inform you that your product [product_title] has been deleted. 
Store: [store_title]
Store Link: [store_link]
Please contact administrator for more information.

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to members who had purchased deleted products.

[header]

We are sorry to inform you that product [product_title] which you had purchased has been deleted. 
Store: [store_title]
Store Link: [store_link]
OrderId: [store_order]
Please contact administrator or store owner for more information.

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to members who have favourited deleted product.

[header]

We are sorry to inform you that the product [product_title] which you had set favourite has been deleted. 
Store: [store_title]
Store Link: [store_link]
Please contact administrator or store owner for more information.

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to members who have followed the store which has just released new product.
New product at your followed store!

[header]

A new product has been posted at the store [store_title] which you have followed.

==========Details==============

Name of Product: [product_title]
Link of Product: [product_link]	
Name of Store:   [store_title]
Link of Store:   [store_link]	

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to members who have requested a refund.

[header]

We have just received a request for refund for the product below:
==========Details==============
Name of Product: [product_title]
Link of Product: [product_link]	
Name of Store:   [store_title]
Link of Store:   [store_link]
Order ID: [store_orderid]	

Your refund request is being checked. The store owner will be in contact with you soon. 

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to members whose have products that got refund request.
Your store have been asked for a refund

[header]

We have just received a request for refund for the product below:
==========Details==============
Name of Product: [product_title]
Link of Product: [product_link]	
Name of Store:   [store_title]
Link of Store:   [store_link]
Order ID: [store_orderid]	

Buyer Name: [buyer_name]
Email Address: [buyer_email]
Address: [buyer_address]

Please contact with administrator/buyer to resolve the refund request.

[footer]
